zh:
戰斗是回合制。
敵方頭上的會顯示下一回合的行動意圖，行動包括移動、轉向、放置一個技能、發動放置的技能、待命。
然後看速度決定行動順序。
每個技能都有冷卻回合，在圖標的下方顯示。

勝利條件為敵方全部死亡。
失敗條件為己方全部死亡。
en:
The battle is turn-based.
The enemy's head will display the action intention for the next turn. Actions include moving, turning, placing a skill, activating the placed skill, and standing by. 
Then decide the order of actions based on speed.
Each skill has a cooldown turn, which is displayed below the icon.

The victory condition is that all enemies die.
The failure condition is that all party members die.
